Vegetable Vendor Management System

About Us

K2V Infotech LLP, a limited liability partnership registered under the laws of India, having its Corporate office at No. 1691, 7th Cross, E & F Block, Ramakrishna Nagar, MYSURU - 570023, Karnataka, India.

We work with your team to understand the scope of work, dependencies and goals.

The combination of a zero pollution healthy environment and exciting work opportunities is what makes K2V special.

K2V is providing unique services to customers. K2V caters to the need of customers with a short term and long term requirement of consultants. We use standard methodologies with cost effective and faster turnaround time.

K2V IT experts are eager to build products that need the highest quality check, security and standards in the industry. K2V is staffed to provide you with the guarantee to turn your big ideas into an amazing product. We work around the clock to get things done.

Lead by a team of young and energetic professionals, we develop and support ERP applications and web based applications. Our team comprises of committed, experienced and smart individuals who are ready to work in any new technology - application and platform. We are able to provide services to our clients at a competitive price. We provide resources to employers based on their requirement. We help Job seekers to get trained and find a job. We develop training videos to help people learn new technology, application and skills to perform a job.


This project(Vegetable Vendor Management System) is developed as part of Internship by the student of Department of Computer science and Engineering,Maharaja Institute Of Technology Mysore.

The Guiding and hosting was carried by K2V Infotech LLP.
